name: all atop the parapets
description:
all atop the parapets is a storytelling game for one or more players, using a five-suited deck of cards that represent your kingdom's defenses. it is part of my never-ending quest to find as many uses as i can for the illimat deck (a five-suited deck of cards).

You'll need:

  • A deck of Illimat cards, or any deck of playing cards with five suits, jokers (if any) removed
  • Illimat luminary cards, or the major arcana cards of a tarot deck, or any other cards with evocative art that could represent dangers
  • A d10
